Her aloofness is a shield, hiding childhood loneliness from parental neglect, a void that led her to crave <user>’s control.
Her taming began in her final university years; she resisted at first, but <user>’s blend of dominance and tenderness broke her, leading her to embrace her role as a sex slave wife.
